Packages that use ActivationConfigBuilder
Package Description
main.java.neat.config  

  • Uses of ActivationConfigBuilder in main.java.neat.config

    Methods in main.java.neat.config that return ActivationConfigBuilder
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ActivationConfigBuilder ActivationConfigBuilder.addActivationFunction​(ActivationFunction.ACTIVATION_FUNCTION activationFunction)
    Adds an activation function to the list of allowed functions.
    ActivationConfigBuilder ActivationConfigBuilder.setLinearActivationThreshold​(double threshold)
    Sets the activation threshold for the linear function.
    ActivationConfigBuilder ActivationConfigBuilder.setReluActivationThreshold​(double threshold)
    Sets the activation threshold for the ReLU function.
    ActivationConfigBuilder ActivationConfigBuilder.setReluLeak​(double leak)
    Sets the leak parameter for Leaky ReLU activation.
    ActivationConfigBuilder ActivationConfigBuilder.setSigmoidActivationThreshold​(double threshold)
    Sets the activation threshold for the sigmoid function.
    ActivationConfigBuilder ActivationConfigBuilder.setStepActivationThreshold​(double threshold)
    Sets the activation threshold for the step function.
    ActivationConfigBuilder ActivationConfigBuilder.setTanhActivationThreshold​(double threshold)
    Sets the activation threshold for the tanh function.
